website_summaries.verdict: A mid-range priced float tube that is well-made and easy to maneuver.
pros: Stable in the water and moves easily
Yellow color makes it easy for boaters to spot
cons: The cup holder is a bit small and placed awkwardly

customer_reviews.title: Caddis Sports Customer Support Requesting Replacement Boston Valves
customer_reviews.text: Fill valve broke while filling. Email send to manufacturer Caddis Sports on 8/20/16. Received an email reply from customer service rep on 8/22/16. I sent an email reply on 8/22/16 requesting info for purchasing replacement valves. No response from Caddis Customer Service as of 8/26/16. Sent a new email request on 8/26/16. Update 09/08/2016 - Still No Response to 8/26/2016 email request to purchase replacement Boston Valve
customer_reviews.author: John KM Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... of Caddis Float tube I've owned and is the best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th type of Caddis Float tube I've owned and is the best of the bunch. I used it for the first time this past week & enjoyed it. Even with stiff wind waves, it was stable and moved easily. It still can be improved by proving larger pockets, a longer striping basket, and a couple more D-rings in beside the backrest
customer_reviews.author: robert m

customer_reviews.title: For the bucks
customer_reviews.text: This is the bomb. Caddis makes good stuff in my experience. This isn’t the priciest, not the cheapest, but it sure works well for me. The features are what I want, not too much, not too little. More importantly, the construction, design, fit and finish are too notch.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanMoniqueTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: The Cadillac of float tubes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product! Compared to my previous float tube, that the rat's in my shed thoroughly enjoyed, this is like a speed boat! I love it! As a note to self, I will store this one better! I bought it used on Amazon, it had never been used, just came in a different box. I saved a lot of money buying it used, I was sceptical at first, but I will buy more used items on Amazon from now on. I'm all about saving some of my hard earned cash. Get you some!
customer_reviews.author: 101st Airborne Veteran

customer_reviews.title: not strong beware
customer_reviews.text: the seams on the left side ripped apart after the first use had it for 1 day before I took it into the water and discovered that it was not properly sewed together I wish I had more time to use it but didn't for 200 you can find something better
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great float tube
customer_reviews.text: Great float tube, great price - about $100 less expensive than at local sporting goods stores. Built to last as well, material is heavy duty, would be hard to puncture while fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Will's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two float tubes and after a few trips the seams ripped apart just like the other reviewers' pictures show. I contacted Caddis Sports about warranty replacement. They sent me a few questions but they have not responded to the answers and it's been almost a month. Very POOR customer service along with products lacking any quality. BEWARE before buying any Caddis product and know they have zero customer support.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great little tube. Blowing it up isn't fun, so now we just leave it filled with air in my garage. Made with great material.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Higher seat, sitting mostly above water!
customer_reviews.text: Love this float tube! Light and I sit out of the water more, allowing me to fish cold water longer. It takes different muscles to fin around but overall it's great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Fly fishing made easy
customer_reviews.text: Had an operation that makes rowing painful, so I had to abandon my pontoon boat. So I purchased the Caddis float tub, and it’s perfect. You sit high saving the shoulders when casting, and it’s “pointed” shape makes it “cut” the water easily. It inflates quickly, shortening the time to get fishin’.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Poor fabric seams after 2nd use.
customer_reviews.text: Protective fabric ripped at seams on both sides second time ever used. Seams ripped while no pressure was being applied and after it had been done being used for the day. If it would have ripped while I was on the water I would probably be with the fish instead of catching them. Other reviews also had same issues. Not an isolated incident
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality AND great price!
customer_reviews.text: This boat performs beautifully! Easy to set up, the stabilizer bar is simple to install after inflation by simply using one's knees. Very stable and roomy. Best of all... can't beat the price!!! Buy anything else and you're spending too much money.
customer_reviews.author: flyrodr

customer_reviews.title: Storage is limited because pockets are small. and water ...
customer_reviews.text: Storage is limited because pockets are small.and water comes in front storage area, so , your stuff camping gear or whatever it has to be packed in water tight baggage!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Fish .......No Problem this floatee is Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very effective in the lake. Only thing missing is OEM rod holder.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Warning warning warning
customer_reviews.text: Warning warning warning. Do not buy low quality material and horrible customer service bought two of these for my kids and both of them filled on the way home from the pond in the back of the truck with no weight on them Save your money and buy a higher-quality boat like a fishcat 5 Pictures for proof and read all the reviews I’m not the only one that had this problem
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kinyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Float Tube -
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy tube is easy to get in and out of. Tube is easy to use and carries tackle easy. Do to the size wind is a issue. I would buy the tube again and would recommend tube purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nealeddie56

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised. Sits up out of the water more than a base model float tube. Much more comfortable. Fished in it for three straight days.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Moran

customer_reviews.title: seat
customer_reviews.text: the seat is just foam and cannot be folded very bulky for making it smaller for traveling, no traveling case is included, inflatable cushions are much better
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Masar

customer_reviews.title: Seam ripped on second use
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the tube but the seam ripped after the second use. A little unbelievable for this to happen with the high cost of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donya K. Charlson

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: I had to shorten the cross bar to make it work for me, this float tube is well made to last
customer_reviews.author: Brian Frank

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality I bought 2 of them and had to return both of them when replacement came one of them started to deflate on second trip
customer_reviews.author: Miro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fishing tube but hard to get bladder valve stem in the grommet right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great service and fast delivery. sits high in the float tube which is great.
customer_reviews.author: paul hwang

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Now I'm thinking I ought to upgrade my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. Works great! Now I'm thinking I ought to upgrade my old Caddis tube with one like this!
customer_reviews.author: PSL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes it holds up extremely well for the fishing I do
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this two weeks ago and I'm about to go out my third time. Spent 3-4 hours comfortably fishing in the sun. Behind the seat perfectly fits a cooler that I keep a can of worms and a few soda pops in. All seams seem to be double stitched and high quality. The drink holder is a little awkward but if you take a big drink from your can before putting it in the holder you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: A good boat and nice and stable in the water
customer_reviews.text: A good boat and nice and stable in the water. I would give it 5 starts, but this thing is awkward to carry in. I tried using a backpack, but that didn't work. The conventional rough belly boat is easier to carry in on your head with all your gear tucked in. A good product though!
customer_reviews.author: tg

customer_reviews.title: Product works great.
customer_reviews.text: Use this product for float fishing down a river. Product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Buying two more for my son
customer_reviews.text: My caddis arrived Wednesday take it out of the lake Friday very please ,the maneuverability and handling the on the water out standing, was considering getting the pontoon boat first ,but I think I made the right decision was only on the water for 3 hours before I had to go to work hit the honey hole caught 4 nice cats, what have not been able to do that from the shore now my sons want me to buy two more but I'm going to order next week for them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Caddis Sports Premier Plus Float Tube, Yellow
product_meta.description: Introducing Caddis' most advanced and durable float tube. Top and pockets are made of heavy-duty rip stop material and heavy duty Tarpaulin bottom to reduce resistance in the water and protect against punctures and wear. All critical seams are double stitched. Foam seat and adjustable backrest sits you above the water for less drag and warmer days of fishing. Storage features include two large and two small pockets, front rod holder straps, two dry fly patches and cargo area behind seat. Custom Boston Valves and bladder-to-cover attachment points make filling and deflating your Premier Plus easy. Also includes florescent safety accents behind the seat, stabilizer bar and stripping apron and D-Rings for shoulder straps. The maximum weight capacity on this float tube is 325 lbs.
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY RIP STOP MATERIAL ON TOP
HEAVY DUTY TARPAULIN BOTTOM AND FRONT ENDS
ADJUSTABLE 4" FOAM SEAT AND 2" FOAM BACKREST
TWO LARGE MAIN EQUIPMENT POCKETS, AND TWO ZUXILIARY POCKETS
